title: HW1: Intro to HTML
description: Use Notepad to create an HTML file that contains your name and student id.

title: HW3: Form
description:
Create a form that contains: (at least)
-Textbox
-Radio button
-Select
-Checkbox
-Text area

-Make sure to decorate your form using CSS, Bootstrap, or whatever you like to use

title: HW 4: JS 1
description: Write a webpage that receives a number from window.prompt() - Then display Multiple Table in the form of <table> using Javascipt ( document.write()) - Deploy your work to Firebase Hosting. (using firebase deploy) Submit your source code and Link to your Firebase project to Google classroom.
